title: 【英语贴】Classic material 1.5 16x 32x 64x....
author: shen丶安慰
txt_content:
本帖最后由 shen丶安慰 于 2013-5-10 23:59 编辑 

A very classic material package, from version 1 has been, the official website to download the content is always the first few rows, unused to download experience!Reminder: computer configuration of poor people do not recommend downloading too high pixel version, may make the game to crash.Download: http://pan.baidu.com/share/link? Shareid=412526&uk=268553037 reminder: there are 16x 32x 64x 128X has been to 512X please choose download can be full.If you want 1.4.7 to download address: http://pan.baidu.com/share/link? Shareid=159602&uk=2635901766&third=0

Chinese version: http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? Mod=viewthread&tid=110095&page=1&extra=#pid1899522

replies.author: 和平万岁
replies.txt_content:
一直是一个很经典的材料包裹，从版本1的官方网站上下载的内容始终是排第几，未使用的下载体验！
提醒：电脑配置不好的人建议不要下载太多的高像素版本，可能使游戏崩溃。
下载：http://pan.baidu.com/share/link？ Shareid=412526＆UK=268553037提醒：有16X32X64X128X一直512X请选择可以下载完整的。
如果你想1.4.7下载地址：http://pan.baidu.com/share/link? Shareid=159602&uk=2635901766&third=0

谷沟翻译无压力

话说这不就是人人皆知的五边形吗！
